name: Wrench Kiss
description:
Here's my submission to Butterscotch ShenaniJam2019. 

Theme: Wrenches 101

Achievements: Mozart, Maverick

In this game you have to tighten bolts the correct  way using your friend Wrenchy. The more bolt you tightened the more points you get. Each level includes a new piece with its own tightening bolt rules.

The game is not great, but this is what happen when you accept your friends invitations to play video games during a jam and have not enough will power to refuse!

Have fun!
